parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate. It focuses on the activities of Romsilva, a Romanian state-owned forestry company, showcasing images of European bisons in a nature park.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and aims to reach a wide audience, not just specific individuals.  The reach estimate is ">1M".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is not to influence the vote in the parliamentary elections.  The content is informational and promotional, focusing on the work of Romsilva and the wildlife in its care. There is no mention of any political party, candidate, or electoral platform.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of public relations or citizen journalism, aiming to inform the public about Romsilva's activities and the natural environment. It presents factual information and visually appealing content.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express personal opinions related to the elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1088786542644998</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post by Regia Nationala a Padurilor - Romsilva is a paid advertisement showcasing images of European bisons in a nature park. The content is informational and promotional, focusing on the work of Romsilva and the natural environment.  It does not mention any political party, candidate, or electoral platform. The post's objective is not to influence the vote in the parliamentary elections. Therefore, it does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006 and Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Regia Nationala a Padurilor - Romsilva</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
